alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 9:28AM AKST until December 09 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast widns gusting to 50 mph will cause periods of low visibility in snow and blowing snow. winds will gradually decrease on Saturday causing the visibility to improve Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
